# right

**Type Property**

The right edge of the rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
static var right: UIRectEdge { get }
```

## Edges

- **top**: The top edge of the rectangle.
- **left**: The left edge of the rectangle.
- **bottom**: The bottom edge of the rectangle.
- **all**: All edges of the rectangle.
